PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-07512003-05-27INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of W.R. (BILL) ALLEN of Guelph, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, representing the region set out in subparagraph 11(3)(a)(iii) of the Act, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
